name: A Midsummer Nightmare
description:
Made in 50h for the Pencil Chisel Code Game Jam 2 by the Boogie Games Studio.
Launch the boogie-rts.exe to play.

You are Cathy, the best and favorite plushie of Billy. This honorful role implies also to take care of Billy's sleep! Recently, it has become more and more difficult: Billy is having nightmares! Tonight, you will protect him to preserve his comfort, with the help of your toy colleagues. Lead the toys to fight the nightmares. You will need to explore the room looking for good memories to recruit more toys. Destroy the nightmare nests and protect Billy until the end of the night. Good luck!

Move with the keyboard (awsd).

Select the toys by making a box with the mouse.
Left-click to select/deselect them.

Right-click to move them.

Press E to call them all (or stop the rush)!

Those are Billy's good memories! Grab them to put the toys into motion!

This is the Toy Chest!
Go near it and press I with enough memories to summon a toy!





Those are nightmares! You cannot kill them but you can stun them using F!
Command the toys to banish them!







Find and destroy the nests and survive for long enough to win the game.
